title: Braže: Latvia will never recognise occupied Ukraine as part of Russia
summary_full: Latvia's Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, made an unequivocal statement on December 15th saying that Latvia would never recognise the areas of Ukraine currently under Russian occupation as Russian territory.
summary_public: Latvia's Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, made an unequivocal statement on December 15th saying that Latvia would never recognise the areas of Ukraine currently under Russian occupation as Russian territory.
